channel.title: Leveling Pinky
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Leveling Pinky"

item.title: Re: Leveling Pinky
item.content:encoded: Are you sure "All Together Now" includes the bonus 4% you get for failing, or does it only affect the base chance? I've always assumed it was the latter.

item.title: Re: Leveling Pinky
item.content:encoded:
is Pinky in your team while you're attempting this?

I'm afraid so. I've leveled Pinky five times and I've never had this much trouble before. This is the first time I used All Together Now to do it though, so I was wondering if it might be bugged. I did eventually level her today.

item.title: Re: Leveling Pinky
item.content:encoded:
It may seem obvious to a lot of people, but is Pinky in your team while you're attempting this? It might seem obvious, but a few people don't seem to realize this.

Barring the above possiblity, it might just be horrible luck. Not much help for that, unfortunatelyâ€¦

item.title: Leveling Pinky
item.content:encoded:
I have a season 2 character who was using All Together Now to try and level Pinky. The Confess their Emo Love mission came up over fifteen times and I passed it each time. I am assuming that Pinky has a base chance of leveling of 0% that increases by 4% each time you succeed in the mission and do not level her. With All Together now, I should have had over a hundred percent chance to level her at attempt thirteen.

Should I bug report this (as a lot of this is conjecture and has not been confirmed by McMasters as far as I know)?
